random.li: Hello, how can I help you?

category.template: Interstellar is a 2014 science fiction movie directed by Christopher Nolan. The movie follows a group of astronauts who travel through a wormhole in search of a new home for humanity after Earth becomes uninhabitable. Along the way, they encounter various challenges and obstacles that test their resolve and their understanding of the nature of time and space.
Interstellar was directed by Christoper Nolan!

Black holes are created when a star dies and collapses in on itself. Right at the moment of its creation, a gigantic explosion is released which is called a supernova. This supernova creates so much light and energy that it can be seen billions of light years away! After a black hole is born, it will suck in all matter and light through gravity and grow as it consumes more and more.
Interstellar is a science fiction movie.
. The movie features a cast of actors, including Matthew McConaughey, Anne Hathaway, Jessica Chastain, and Michael Caine, among others.
The movie is quite long compared to the average runtime of a movie it has a runtime of 2 hours and 49 minutes.

category.pattern: WHAT AWARDS DID THE MOVIE WIN
category.template: Interstellar was critically acclaimed upon its release in 2014, and it received numerous award nominations and wins. Such as the Academy Awards for Best Visual Effects and BAFTA Awards for Best Special Visual Effects.
